title: South Korea Tourism Revenues
description: Tourism Revenues in South Korea increased to 1161200 USD Million in September from 1093400 USD Million in August of 2022. Tourism Revenues in South Korea averaged 841581.38 USD Million from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2227900 USD Million in March of 2019 and a record low of 326500 USD Million in June of 2003. In South Korea, Tourism Revenues refers to the amount of expenditure that international visitor pays for goods and services in the country. This page provides - South Korea Tourism Revenues- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Korea Tourism Organization
